summary: <Use to override the default edit summary>
P170: <value> - for simple values without qualifiers e.g. '123', 'Q42', 'File:Foo.jpg'. Doesn't work for complex values such as monolingual_text/quantites etc.

P180._: <value> - could be a simple value e.g. '123', 'Q42' or a dict for monolingual/quantites/coordinates etc. e.g. ({'text': 'Foo', 'lang': 'en'})
P180.P181: <qualifier> - could be a dict for monolingual/quantites/coordinates etc.
P190: <value_2 - could also be a dict per P180 example>
